companies.name: DILLON STATE PARK
companies.description: The wooded hills and scenic valleys surrounding Dillon State Park in east central Ohio offer a picturesque setting for outdoor adventure. Whether boating the quiet coves and inlets of the lake or hiking the forest trails, you'll have an outstanding recreational experience at this 2,285-acre park.

companies.name: Ohio University Zanesville
companies.description: Zane State College, established in 1969, values people through our commitment to quality, equity, and stewardship. Zane State College has 30 programs that lead to an associate degree, and an Electrical Engineering Technology Bachelor’s degree.
